price: 28. Ir pasakyk jiems, jog vanduo turi būti padalintas (tarp jos) ir jų, kiekvieno teisė gerti paskirta (eilėmis).
arabic: وَنَبِّئۡهُمۡ أَنَّ ٱلۡمَآءَ قِسۡمَةُۢ بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلُّ شِرۡبٖ مُّحۡتَضَرٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wanabbi'hum anna al-māa qis'matun baynahum kullu shir'bin muḥ'taḍarun
